contribution_desc:
Interaction techniques and study for focus+context interactions using a mobile device (smartwatch/smartphone) as focus view and an HMD for context view. The HMD, therefore, extends the output space beyond the mobile device.

Also, authors discuss three different alignment modes for how to align the context view (HMD) with the focus view (mobile device). The alignment modes are body-aligned, side-by-side, device-aligned and were studied in a controlled lab experiment.
toolkits: Java-based application server; HTML5; JavaScript; WebSockets; hammer.js; three.js;
device_models: Samsung Galaxy SIII (smartphone); Vuzix Star 1200 XL HMD; Sony Xperia Z1 compact (smartwatch)
